metadata.title: CVE-2021-44858 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in MediaWiki before 1.35.5, 1.36.x before 1.36.3, and 1.37.x before 1.37.1. It is possible to use action=edit&undo= followed by action=mcrundo and action=mcrrestore to view private pages on a private wiki that has at least one page set in $wgWhitelistRead.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
